author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TODAY...
summary: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TODAY... As of 2:00 AM AST Fri Aug 15 the center of Erin was located near 17.3, -53.0 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TODAY... As of 2:00 AM AST Fri Aug 15 the center of Erin was located near 17.3, -53.0 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
